description: Basic information about a registered JSON schema

numericId.description: The Synapse issued numeric identifier of the JSON schema.

organizationId.description: The Synapse issued numeric identifier of the organization that the JSON schema belongs

name.description: The name of the JSON schema

createdOn.description: The date this JSON schema as first created.
createdOn.title: Created On

createdBy.description: The ID of the user that first created this JSON schema.
createdBy.title: Created By
